title: The distance between the main building and the rear boundary of the plot shall be; not less than 20 feet
clause_text: The distance between the main building and the rear boundary of the plot shall be; not less than 20 feet. Provided that, subsidiary buildings such as outhouse, a garage, stable, privy and the like may be permitted at the rear of the main building subject to the condition that such building shall be at a distance of not less than 10 feet from either any building in the compound or boundary of the plot.
section: Special Building Rules framed by the Collector of Pune for this area shall be applicable which are as given below -

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
